landing_seo_title: Stocknear — Institutional-Grade Stock Data for Everyone
landing_seo_description: AI-powered stock analysis, real-time options flow, smart money tracking, and 200+ screener filters. Join 10,000+ investors using institutional-grade data. Free to start.
landing_hero_subtitle: See what hedge funds, Congress members, and institutional traders are buying before the market moves. Real-time data that used to cost $24,000/year, now starting at $0.
landing_review_1_text: I've used Unusual Whales, Ghostboard, Flowtopia, Big Short and Only Flows. Not only is Stocknear better, it has a more affordable price. Live option flow, dark pool, congress trading, hedge fund tracking and even POTUS tracking. If I could give 10 stars I would.
landing_review_2_text: Before discovering this platform, I had to visit multiple websites to access the same data Stocknear provides in one place. Detailed fundamentals, analyst ratings, Congress trading insights, options and dark pool flow, earnings strategies, AI scores, and more. It truly deserves more attention.
landing_review_3_text: Stocknear has become an essential part of my daily stock analysis routine. The platform has a wealth of tools and insights, all presented in a clean UI that works seamlessly on both web and mobile. It's packed with financial metrics, AI forecasts, and insider trading information.
landing_review_4_text: I've been using Stocknear for several months, and I'm honestly impressed with how much it's helped me level up my stock research. The price is really reasonable for the amount of value you get. The Discord community is fantastic for exchanging ideas and strategies with other users.
landing_review_5_text: Offers premium features like live options data and historical data for an affordable price. There are usually new features being rolled out weekly so the app keeps improving. Creator is open to feature requests and takes pride in their product.
landing_review_6_text: Brings analysis tools to retail investors in a way that elevates decision making to pro levels. Stocknear has accelerated adding new features on top of an already solid foundation. The latest AI support helps understand what the data is saying. There's a lot of value in this one website.
landing_features_title: Everything you need to invest smarter
landing_features_subtitle: From AI research to real-time institutional flow data. Tools that used to cost thousands, now free to start.
landing_more_tools_title: Plus 200+ more tools built for serious investors
landing_more_tool_screener_desc: 200+ filters across fundamentals, technicals, and options metrics. Pre-built strategies for dividend growth, value, and momentum.
landing_more_tool_congress_desc: Track what politicians, hedge fund managers, and corporate insiders are buying and selling with real filing data.
landing_more_tool_darkpool_desc: Monitor institutional block trades and dark pool prints that most retail traders never see.
landing_more_tool_portfolio_desc: Track your P&L, benchmark against the S&P 500, and get AI-powered analysis of your holdings.
landing_feature_ai_description: Ask any question about any stock and get a data-backed answer in seconds. 11 specialized agents pull from 60+ real-time data sources so you skip the 30 minutes of manual research.
landing_feature_ai_bullet_1: Get a morning market briefing before the bell rings
landing_feature_ai_bullet_2: Run full due diligence on any company in 60 seconds
landing_feature_ai_bullet_3: Research earnings plays with real options and sentiment data
landing_feature_ai_bullet_4: Compare two stocks side-by-side with live fundamentals
landing_feature_ai_placeholder: Screenshot: AI Agent chat interface showing a sample stock analysis query with real-time data response
landing_feature_flow_description: Watch institutional-size options trades hit the tape in real time. When a fund drops $2M on NVDA calls expiring Friday, you see it the same second they do.
landing_feature_flow_bullet_1: Live flow with premium paid, sentiment, and trade size
landing_feature_flow_bullet_2: 7 pre-built filters: Bullish Sweeps, Golden Sweeps, Zero DTE, and more
landing_feature_flow_bullet_3: Audio alerts so you never miss a high-conviction trade
landing_feature_flow_bullet_4: Dark pool prints and block trades included
landing_feature_screener_title: Find Your Next Trade in Seconds
landing_feature_screener_description: 200+ filters across fundamentals, technicals, and options metrics. Screen thousands of stocks to find exactly what matches your strategy.
landing_feature_screener_bullet_1: Pre-built strategies: Dividend Growth, Value, Momentum
landing_feature_screener_bullet_4: Options metrics including IV and unusual activity
landing_feature_screener_placeholder: Screenshot: Stock Screener with active filters and results table showing matching stocks
landing_feature_smart_description: Track what politicians, hedge fund managers, and corporate insiders are buying and selling — and invest alongside them.
landing_feature_smart_bullet_1: Congress trading with party and amount data
landing_feature_smart_bullet_2: 13F hedge fund filings and position changes
landing_feature_smart_bullet_4: POTUS executive order and policy tracker
landing_feature_smart_placeholder: Screenshot: Congress Trading page showing recent politician stock trades with buy/sell data
landing_feature_wiim_description: Stop staring at a 5% move and wondering what happened. Get the catalyst behind every significant price move explained in plain English, with dollar impact and context.
landing_feature_wiim_bullet_1: See the exact news event that triggered each move
landing_feature_wiim_bullet_2: Dollar and percentage impact breakdown per catalyst
landing_feature_wiim_bullet_3: Historical pattern context so you know if the move is noise or signal
landing_feature_analyst_title: Wall Street Data at Your Fingertips
landing_feature_analyst_description: Not all analysts are equal. We track their historical accuracy so you know whose price targets actually hit and whose to ignore.
landing_feature_analyst_bullet_1: Accuracy rankings and win rates for every analyst
landing_feature_analyst_bullet_2: Real-time upgrades, downgrades, and target changes
landing_feature_analyst_bullet_3: Consensus price targets with calculated upside potential
landing_how_step1_description: Sign up in 30 seconds with your email or Google account. No credit card required.
landing_how_step2_description: AI agent, screeners, options flow, smart money tracking, and 10,000+ stocks — all at your fingertips.
landing_how_step3_description: Start free with 10 AI credits/month. Upgrade to Plus ($5/mo) or Pro ($15/mo) billed annually when you're ready.
landing_pricing_subtitle: Start free. Upgrade when you need more power.
landing_faq_subtitle: Everything you need to know about getting started.
landing_faq_q1_answer: Yes. The free plan gives you 10 AI credits per month, 1 watchlist, 1 portfolio, 3 price alerts, and access to the stock screener. No credit card required to sign up.
landing_faq_q2_title: What data sources does Stocknear use?
landing_faq_q2_answer: We partner with the same institutional-grade data vendors that serve hedge funds and investment banks. Our data covers real-time quotes, financial statements, options chains, insider trades, congress filings, analyst ratings, and more.
landing_faq_q3_title: How is this different from other platforms?
landing_faq_q3_answer: Stocknear combines real-time options flow, AI-powered stock analysis, dark pool tracking, congress trading data, hedge fund 13F filings, and 200+ screener filters in one platform. Most competing platforms charge $100-200/month for similar data. Our Pro plan starts at $15/month billed annually.
landing_faq_q4_answer: Absolutely. There are no contracts or hidden fees. You can cancel your Plus or Pro subscription with one click, and you'll keep access until the end of your billing period.
landing_faq_q5_answer: Not at all. Our AI agent explains everything in plain English, and we have 205+ educational articles covering every concept from basics to advanced strategies. The platform is built for beginners and professionals alike.
landing_cta_title: Stop Trading Blind. Start Trading With Data.
landing_cta_description: 10,000+ investors already use Stocknear to track smart money, analyze options flow, and find trades faster. Your free account is 30 seconds away.
